fullText: Bertie Carvel gives a commanding performance as the ruthless media mogul Rupert Murdoch in this crackling drama about the transformation of a failing newspaper into a scandalous tabloid.
dtliExcerpt: Bertie Carvel gives a commanding performance as the ruthless media mogul Rupert Murdoch in this crackling drama about the transformation of a failing newspaper into a scandalous tabloid.
